content: Yes, it's definitely possible that your grandma will start using emojis in her text messages. As more older consumers become tech-savvy, they will begin to use technology in new and creative ways, including adopting the latest trends and features. Companies that cater to the needs of older consumers should consider this trend and ensure that their products and services are user-friendly and accessible. This will help older consumers to be more comfortable and confident in using technology, ultimately benefiting both the consumers and the companies that serve them.
